title: Topic 002 Question 025
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an AI enrichment pipeline in Azure Cognitive Search and an Azure Storage account that has 10 GB of scanned documents and images.
You need to index the documents and images in the storage account. The solution must minimize how long it takes to build the index.
options: From the Azure portal, configure parallel indexing.
From the Azure portal, configure scheduled indexing.
Configure field mappings by using the REST API.
Create a text-based indexer by using the REST API.
